Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Enacts the "stop continuing unnecessary orders and mandates at once act"
Summary: Authorizes the legislature to modify an executive order.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to enacting the "stop continuing unnecessary orders and mandates at once act"
